ex00¶

ex00.main.ask(n: int, q: dict) → int[source]¶

Asks question, accepts answer from the user and checks if it is correct

Parameters:

  • n – The number of the question

  • q – Dict which contains question and answer

Returns:

1 if answer is correct, 0 otherwise
